title: 4 ROOM APARTMENT FOR RENT IN MY HOME
posting_body: ['One bedroom 15×15, one bath 15×8, kitchen 15×18, porch 9×7.', 'Following items are all new, 99in bathroom cabinet with sink/faucet, tub/shower, kitchen cabinets with countertops with double sinks and faucet, refrigerator, gas stove/oven.', 'Call time indicated only, owner works out of state.', 'ONLY Hardwood and TILE floors throughout.', 'CALL TIME Fri,SAT,SUN, 8AM TO 10AM, only call time Friday Saturday and Sunday 8 a.m. to 10 a.m. only, call', 'INDICATED time ONLY PLEASE.', 'Tenant pays all their own utilities plus 50% of garbage,  unit has its own separate meter.', 'No pets.', 'No smoking.', 'Call indicated time only, owner works out of state.', 'NEW Energy efficient natural gas heaters, means very low cost gas bill.', 'heats your rooms only, NOT complete house.', 'Porch not heated.', 'New aluminum pop-out Windows that conserve heat.', 'Extra quite dead end street.', 'CALL ONLY TIME  INDICATED  ONLY!', 'Large enclosed area to grow Garden and flowers.', 'Also much inside storage areas to the right tenant.', 'joe hill at hot mail dot com', '1 month security deposit required.', ' Month to month $499.00, sign 1 year STAY.rent $449.00.', ',3YEAR STAY $349 three year stay.', 'City of Hammond 20ft pole light located in my yard,  which protects the complete yard,car,apartment and driveway and perimeter of fenced in premises.', ' 8 FT privacy fence which protects tenants privacy, your car locked inside locked area,  driveway and overall security.', ' Premises equipped with exterior motion lighting detectors throughout the yard.', 'Helpful ,but  not necessary job record, rental record,creit report, utility records,STATE PICTURE I. D.,CALL ONLY  TIME  INDICATED!', 'You may email these helpful items if you want 2.', 'Call time indicated only, owner works out of state.', 'To enter the premises, requires three (3) keys....driveway gate, apartment exterior door and kitchen door.', 'Please contact ONLY during the hours of 8am-10am on Friday,Saturday and Sunday.', 'at 708 799 2363 DO NOT TEXT!!!', 'MUST call time indicated.', "Best to call and talk to the owner, email and a text are not good if you're really interested in the apartment please call.", 'Please call only time indicated.', 'Owner out of state.', 'Mail address.', 'All the Above for only 349 dollars 3 Years stay.', 'Good payment record helpful.', 'P.O. Box 1036', 'HOMEWOOD, Illinois', '60430', 'Owner lives out of state you must called at the time and date indicated.', 'CALL TIME INDICATED.', 'ONLY!']
